replies.bodyText:
If maxSamplingCount is 2, and totalStartedProfilingCount start with 0.
Use < to decide isStartProfileable, the second time to incrementAndGet will return false. That's not right.
replies.author: mrproliu

timeline.bodyText:

Because we don't know whether the doc exists in the master branch.

timeline.bodyText: I think it is better to use queryProfiledSegments(String taskId) to replace this method and IProfileThreadSnapshotQueryDAO interface. There seems meaningless to add a new interface.

timeline.bodyText: What is the difference? Please remove the useless one.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText: You should still send traffic and verify service/instance/endpoint, just no metrics of service/instance/endpoint. If no traffic, then there is no trace to be profiled.
timeline.author: wu-sheng
